'''Brizze''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

A Vailian Trading Company spy, currently undercover as a bathhouse attendant, she has been tasked to retrieve information on a secretive meeting taking place between enemy RDC and Principi agents.

## =Quests

=
* [Dirty Laundry](/dirtyLaundry/): The VTC spy working undercover as a bathhouse attendant. In her short time in the bathhouse, she has gained information regarding the targets, and has a plan to uncover the details of the meeting between the enemy operatives.

## Trivia

* Brizze is only present in the bathhouse during the quest.
